overview: David Faibish brings over 25 years of experience in software development and product management, mostly in database, data warehouse and BI applications. Prior to joining Zoomix, David served as Director of Product Management in HyperRoll, where he was responsible for directing the technological development of the company’s BI data aggregation software. Before joining HyperRoll, David was Group Manager of the Analytics Group at Siebel (NASDAQ: SEBL, acquired by Oracle in June 2006) where he led the architecting, design and implementation efforts of the company’s Data Warehouse product and associated best practices. During his tenure with Siebel, David was awarded the Siebel Engineering Excellence Award for 2002. Prior to Siebel, David held a variety of management positions including product manager for data warehousing at Convergys (NYSE: CVG). David is a graduate of the Israel Defense Forces Computer Science Academy and headed the Computer Information Department in the Home Front Command unit.
